                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
A struggling young couple stumbles upon a cache of dirty money after a shootout 
in their apartment building. With hopes of a better life they flee with the 
money -- provoking the fury of a corrupt DEA agent who will stop at nothing to 
get his money back, and arousing the suspicions of a detective who is determined 
to find out what&#039;s really going before its too late.

Director: Keith Samples

Writer  : Brian Strasmann

Cast    : Chris Ashworth
        : Josh Berry
        : Frank Bond
        : Gerald Brodin
        : Jeremy Burnell

Enjoy the movie.
